text: The Behemoth is a game company founded in 2003 by John Baez and artist Dan Paladin. == History == In August 2002, Tom Fulp and Dan Paladin created a short Flash game called Alien Hominid for the Newgrounds website. == References == == Other websites == * Category:2003 establishments in California Category:Video game companies of the United States
title: The Behemoth
